Package net.coderodde.multilog.contoller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountServlet
    This servlet handles the account related activities.
    DeleteAccountServlet
    This servlet handles the requests to delete an account.
    HomeServlet
    This servlet customizes the home view of multilog.
    PostServlet
    This servlet is responsible for persisting the posts.
    SigninServlet
    This servlet authenticates the users, and upon successful authentication creates a session for the user.
    SignoutServlet
    This servlet signs out the users.
    SignupServlet
    This servlet handles the sign up process.
    ThreadServlet
    This servlet is responsible for showing particular threads.
    TopicServlet
    This servlet processes the topic-related views.
    UpdateAccountServlet
    This servlet is responsible for updating the user accounts.
    UpdatePostServlet
    This servlet is responsible for updating the posts.
